long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thumb makes it easy to jump around a webpage!

Instructions:
1: Press Thumb icon on while viewing a webpage

2: Scroll down the page

3: Hold Shift to view the part of the page you thumbed

4: Release Shift to continue where you left off on the page.

Perfect for referencing parts of tutorials farther up the page, or possibly jumping around wikipedia pages.

Note: pressing Ctrl will permanently return you to the thumbed portion of the page.
